SEARCH
Package utils

Class connexionBDD

java.lang.Object
utils.connexionBDD
public class connexionBDD extends Object
The connexionBDD class provides methods to test and obtain a connection to a MySQL database.

To use this class, make sure to have the MySQL JDBC driver (com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver) in the classpath of your project.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Tommy Brisset
